div.p: I am a Computes Scientist and a Software Engineer (employeed as an Android developer, have experience in Desktop and Full-Stack development). I am officially employed by the Cyber-Rom company as an Android developer. Currently, I am studying for a bachelor's degree at Innopolis University.
I believe that theory and practice are inseparable, so I back up my knowledge with competent technical literature and create projects in various spheres.

As for my main interests in Compute Science, I am passionate about system programming, high-performance computing (parallelism, concurrency, asynchronous execution) and native and cross-platform mobile development.
When I have a free time, I explore something new and make articles about it. Speaking about hobbies, I like producing electronic music and work out in the gym
